item.title: My Experience at the CDSB Workshop 2019
item.description: Welcoming to the CDSB and TIB workshops 2019 at the Center for Genomic Sciences in Cuernavaca, Morelos, Mexico. I have been using R and Rstudio for a while in some of my bioinformatics projects, which has given me the chance to learn the basics of the language. On this ocassion, I had the opportunity to delve into some more advanced topics by attending to the “CDSB Workshop 2019: How to Build and Create Tidy Tools”, an international workshop held at the Center for Genomic Sciences (CCG) of the National Autonomous University of Mexico (UNAM) in Cuernavaca, Morelos.
